Description: Unifacial triangular scraper of pale brown flint: roughly chipped along each edge. Slight bulb of percussion present.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Merneit, grave Y1 (subsidiary)
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' I (London, 1902), 8, pl.XIV, group marked Y, eleventh from top.
